duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the branch's sales and service operations, ensuring targets are met and customer needs are addressed.
Lead and mentor a team of loan officers by providing guidance, training, and support to foster a high-performance culture.
Develop and execute effective marketing strategies to attract new clients and expand the branch's client base.
Manage and optimize the branch's P&L, ensuring profitability and financial health.
Build and nurture relationships with clients, realtors, builders, and other professionals to drive business growth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
